actions.title: Download your data
actions.description: Prefixing the icon_path with md: allows you to use Material Design icons from https://react-icons.github.io/react-icons/icons?name=md.

actions.title: Delete your data
actions.description: Prefixing the icon_path with fa: allows you to use Font Awesome 5 icons from https://react-icons.github.io/react-icons/icons?name=fa.
